title: in game chat
body: does anyone know how to copy and paste previous things you have said within in-game chat?

replies.body: Currently, there isn't a way for you to select and copy the text from in-game. If this is about something you feel needs to be reported, let us know in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can pull those game logs.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6zEXUxu8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-29T00:02:03.222+0000)
>
> Currently, there isn't a way for you to select and copy the text from in-game. If this is about something you feel needs to be reported, let us know in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can pull those game logs.

really bc this allows me to cop and paste things ive said in game chat and lets me paste them back into in game chat http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4752691
Yea but I don't believe that will allow you to highlight and copy things that were already said from the chatbox, if that does work let me know though!
